nodes.text: The Unending Stars: Meditations on an Ilum Pilgrimage

The Unending Stars: Meditations on an Ilum Pilgrimage was a text commonly studied by Jedi Consular Padawans in 3643 BBY. The title of the text related to unending stars and meditations on a pilgrimage to Ilum, an isolated planet sacred to the Jedi. Under starry skies, the Ilum Temple served as a serene haven for Jedi pilgrims who made their lightsabers with local Adegan crystals and meditated on Ilum's unique bond to the Force.
The Unending Stars: Meditations on an Ilum Pilgrimage was introduced in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
